00015 using std::vector;

00017 using std::pair;

00019 namespace Brutha
00020 {
00021         class BfsTraversal: public Traversal
00022         {
00023                 protected:
00024 
00025                         vector<Move> moves;
00026                         vector<int> cancellations;
00027 
00028                         queue<pair<uint64_t, pair<int, char> > > Q;
00029                         unordered_set<uint64_t> V;
00030                         vector<pair<int, char> > paths;
00031 
00032                         int count;
00033                         int allcount;
00034 
00035                 public:
00036                         BfsTraversal(vector<pair<Move, Move> > &_moves): V(4000000), cancellations(_moves.size() * 2, -1)
00037                         {
00038                                 for(vector<pair<Move, Move> >::iterator it = _moves.begin(); it != _moves.end(); ++it)
00039                                 {
00040                                         if(it->first.fun)
00041                                         {
00042                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->first);
00043                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00044                                         }
00045                                         if(it->second.fun)
00046                                         {
00047                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->second);
00048                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-1] = this->moves.size()-2;
00049                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-2] = this->moves.size()-1;
00050                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00051                                         }
00052                                 }
00053 
00054                                 paths.reserve(4000000);
00055                         }
00056 
00057                         virtual void traverse(Cube start, Examiner &examiner);
00058         };
00059 
00060 }
